sense.def:
Kadar človek
pays someone an amount of money for something
, osebi, ki mu je nekaj dala ali storila nekaj zanj, da določen znesek.

seg.quote: He had paid £5,000 for the boat.
Pay me five pounds.
He paid his bill and left.
I'll pay by cheque.

sense.def:
Kadar delodajalec
pays someone
, tisti osebi daje tedensko ali mesečno plačilo.

seg.quote: She was being paid sixty dollars a week.
The company pays well.

sense.def:
One's pay
je denar, ki ga človek dobi kot tedensko ali mesečno plačilo za opravljeno delo.

seg.quote: She lost three weeks' pay.
...a pay rise of £20 a week.

sense.def:
Kadar posel, pogodba ali naložba
pays a particular amount
, navrže določen znesek.

seg.quote: A day's work pays £2,500.
She complained about her job and how poorly it paid.

sense.def:
Kadar neko ravnanje
pays
, prinese določeno prednost ali korist.

seg.quote: It pays to keep on the right side of your boss.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
pays for something
, trpi ali nosi neprijetne posledice zaradi tega, kar dela ali kar je storil.

seg.quote: He paid dearly for his mistake.
The men paid with their lives.
You failed, and you must pay the penalty.

sense.def:
Glagol
pay
uporabljamo skupaj z nekaterimi samostalniki, ko želimo povedati, da nekdo nekaj da ali stori.

seg.quote: It would be nice if you paid me a visit.
I paid little attention to what I heard.
It was probably the greatest compliment I could have paid her.

sense.def:
To pay one's way
pomeni, da nekdo sam plača za stvari, ki jih potrebuje, in ne dovoli, da bi to storili drugi.

cit.quote: nič ne ostati dolžan, sam se preživljati

sense.def:
Kadar človek
pays back money
, po določenem času v enakem znesku vrne denar, ki si ga je sposodil.

seg.quote: I'll pay you back next week.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
pays someone back for something
, tisti osebi, ki mu je povzročila nekaj neprijetnega, naredi nekaj, zaradi česar bo trpela tudi ona.

Kadar človek
pays off a debt
, vrne ves denar, ki ga je bil dolžan.

seg.quote: He had used the firm's money to pay off gambling debts.

sense.def:
Kadar dejanje
pays off
, je uspešno.

seg.quote: It was a risk and it paid off.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
pays out money
, za določeno stvar porabi denar; ponavadi gre za veliko vsoto.

seg.quote: He had paid out good money to educate Julie.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
pays up
, neki osebi da denar, ki ji ga dolguje.
